name: Bunretsu Shugoshin: Twinkle Star
overview: The hero of the game, a high-school student named Touma, has a strange dream, in which he is a hero, a savior of the world in a parallel dimension. And now he is dying, having sacrificed his life for a beautiful woman whom he calls Ruby. Touma wakes up, unable to understand anything, and suddenly realizes it was not a dream... at least not entirely. A magical symbol is engraved on his forehead. Touma realizes that he will have to learn more about his heroic destiny. Meanwhile, a young, seductive English teacher arrives at his school... Twinkle Star can be considered a visual novel, most of the player's input being reduced to selection of dialogues, context-dependent actions, and hero's own thoughts. During sex scenes, however, the game switched to point-and-click interface with command icons.
